DocAttribute.Name: PhysicalWeight
DocAttribute.Documentation: Weight of an imaginary steel beam per length, as for example given by the national standards for this profile. Usually measured in [kg/m].

DocAttribute.Name: Perimeter
DocAttribute.Documentation: Perimeter of the profile for calculating the surface area. Usually measured in [mm].

DocAttribute.Name: MinimumPlateThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: This value is needed for stress analysis and to handle buckling problems. It can also be derived from the given profile geometry and therefore it is only an optional feature allowing for an explicit description. Usually measured in [mm].

DocAttribute.Name: MaximumPlateThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: This value is needed for stress analysis and to handle buckling problems. It can also be derived from the given profile geometry and therefore it is only an optional feature allowing for an explicit description. Usually measured in [mm].

DocAttribute.Name: CrossSectionArea
DocAttribute.Documentation: Cross sectional area of profile. Usually measured in [mm2].

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The value of the cross section area shall (if given) be greater than zero.
